benchtable 1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

a1.()

Shortcut for apply(x, 1, function(.) expr)

a2.()

Shortcut for apply(x, 2, function(.) expr)

analyseBenchData()

Apply the function what on all lines specified by filter in benchdata

benchmark()

Apply a function to each row of a data.table and add the result as a column

cleanBenchRes()

Clean result-files from a previous benchmark.

collectBenchRes()

Collect benchmark results from .RData files

doBenchJob()

Extract command-line arguments specifying a call to benchmark.

genBenchJobs()

Parallelize a benchmark on data.table by calling benchmark on equal subsets of its lines.

getLineAsList()

Get a list representing a line of a data.table

l.()

Shortcut for lapply(l, function(.) expr)

listBenchAnalysis()

Create a list of matrices with results from analyseBenchData as columns

ll.()

Construct a data.frame from its arguments and evaluate expression on every row

lll.()

Construct a data.frame from its arguments and evaluate expression on every row

s.()

Shortcut for sapply(l, function(.) expr)

transposeAnForBoxPlot()

transpose an into a list of S matrices of length(levels) columns
